Java: <source lang=Java>    public int addOne(final int x) {        x++;            // ERROR: a final variable cannot be reassigned        return x;    }     public ArrayList addOne(final ArrayList list) {        list.add(1);    // OK: it is still possible to modify a                        // final (reference type) variable        return list;    }</source> || style="text-align: center;" | no C# language equivalent
